input.sentences: the bride waited with her bridal party for the ceremony to start .
the two ring bearers were adorable .
the bride and groom listen carefully to the minister .
the guests threw colorful petals as the couple left the ceremony .
output.sentences: The bride looked beautiful as she waited at the entrance of the church.
The minister listened to the groom's vowes.
And then thenewlyweds exchanged smiles and kisses.
Everybody threw petals as the couple left.
